bill.title: Proprietary School and College Registration law; provide for fees and agent permits.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 75-60-4 And 75-60-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The State Board For Community And Junior Colleges To Levy Certain Fees As May Be Required For The Performance Of The Proprietary School And College Registration Law; To Amend Section 75-60-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Surety Bond To Be Posted By Applicants For Certificates Of Registration; To Amend Sections 75-60-19, 75-60-23, 75-60-25, 75-60-27, 75-60-29, 75-60-31, 75-60-33, 75-60-35 And 75-60-37, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For Proprietary School Agent Permits, Fees And Agent Bonds; And For Related Purposes.
